author: thorsten
msg: Extended the siteinfo-meta contract with arbitrary meta data coming from the structurer. Further enhanced the description of the contract.

author: siren
msg: NUTCH-221, removed deprecated Lucene API usage

author: thorsten
msg: Extracting the render-logo again to a contract to its own. The helper contract can only be used internally from within other contracts! Demonstrating how to include/import different contracts from within the branding-logo contract.

author: blautenb
msg: Support for Recover and Reissue XKRSS messages

author: thorsten
msg: Adding the theme name to the build info and changed the siteinfo-meta.ft to use the theme name instead of the skin name.
